name: Karlson Score
description:
This website gets a speedrunners's best times of all categories and calculates a score out of them compared to the best possible time. It also has a comparison section to compare runners best IL times and fullgame times.

I mainly made this ,because davetheepic04 made something simmilar, but in a google doc, which isnt as flexible and customisable as this is.

An important thing to mention is, that the score table is empty at the beginning, so that the user can decide themself who to have on the score list.There is also a "Add Top Players" button for the lazy people, that just wanna see the best times.(These are just the best fullgame players, not best score)

The scores get cached in the users localstorage and will be updated automatically after a set time.
